title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the OpportunityAlertSystem, including user roles, features, integration points with existing systems (HR, Learning Management, Project Management tools), data privacy and security considerations, scalability and performance requirements, and deployment environments.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including components, data flow, technology stack, scalability considerations, security measures, and integration points with existing systems.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for the OpportunityAlertSystem, including wireframes, mockups, and prototypes. The UI should be intuitive, responsive, and accessible, following best practices for user experience design.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Design the database schema for storing and retrieving opportunity data, user profiles, preferences, and notifications. Consider data models for opportunities, users, roles, skills, interests, and notification history. Ensure data integrity, normalization, and efficient querying.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services for managing opportunities, user profiles, and notifications.

title: Implement Frontend Application
description: Implement the frontend application for users to view and manage opportunities and preferences.

title: Implement Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement authentication and authorization mechanisms for secure access to the system.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated build, testing, and deployment of the system.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare user guides, technical documentation, and other supporting materials for the system.
